articles.title: Ukraine war: Finland closes border to Russian tourists - BBC
articles.description: It now means all of Russia's European Union neighbours have shut their borders to its tourists.
articles.content:
By Francesca GillettBBC News
Finland is closing its border to Russian tourists from Friday - the last of Moscow's EU neighbours to do so.
Poland, Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania all closed their bord… [+2356 chars]

articles.title: Porsche shares climb after €75bn listing to defy grim market - Financial Times

articles.content:

articles.title: Queen Margrethe strips four grandchildren of royal titles - News24
articles.description: Denmark's Queen Margrethe, Europe's only reigning queen and the continent's longest serving monarch, on Wednesday, stripped four of her eight grandchildren of their titles.
articles.content:
• Queen Margrethe of Denmark has stripped four of her grandchildren of their royal titles.
